text: Hi Thomas, nice to meet you! Tell me a bit more about yourself and what you're looking to get from the programme :smiley:

Hi Adam, mostly I'm just looking for guidance to improve my skills as a designer as well as hopefully done opportunities to get my foot in the door of my first major job within the games/software industry.
As for who I am, I'm a bit if an eclectic lad and I'm always looking to take part in any interesting project, games related or otherwise.
Other than that, I work at Game for now, refreshing my skills with c# when i can, I enjoy cooking, hanging out with friends and family and playing games. (video or otherwise)
